actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude micro-grants for food security from gross income.

summary.text: This bill excludes from gross income, for income tax purposes, any micro-grant for food security received by an eligible entity under the Agricultural Improvement Act of 2018 (i.e., an individual, Indian tribe, nonprofit organization engaged in increasing food security, or a federally-funded educational facility).

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude micro-grants for food security from gross income.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude micro-grants for food security from gross income.
